tutorials.title: Lab A: Register for Free Tier Account
Lab 2: Create Machine Learning Model
tutorials.description: Explore Zeppelin notebooks and create a ML model on customer credit data set.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Migrate ML Model to ATP

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Operationalize the ML Model in an Application and Expose it as a REST Endpoint
tutorials.description: Set up the ATP environment, import and APEX application and explore how ADB can be embedded into applications.
